name: Ultimate Doom Builder
description: Installs the git build from DRD Team.
notes:
This may take a while; the dotnet472 installer is buggy and stalls a lot.

If you are having video issues, try setting the environmental variable `__GL_MaxFramesAllowed` to 0 instead of 1. (Configure->System options->Show Advanced->Environment variables)
content:
files:
- gzdoom_installer: https://devbuilds.drdteam.org/ultimatedoombuilder/UltimateDoomBuilder-r3309-x64.7z
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/ultimate_doom_builder/Builder.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/ultimate_doom_builder
    src: gzdoom_installer
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Core Fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    description: Installing .NET framework 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
system:
  env:
    __GL_MaxFramesAllowed: 1
